comment:
* Representing the position and other parameters of camera of a single frame.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mAnchorPointInWorldSpace
variables.comment:
* The location of the anchor within the 3D scene.
     * Expecting 3 floats representing the x, y, z coordinates
     * of the anchor point.

variables.name: mAnchorPointInOutputUvSpace
variables.comment:
* Where the anchor point should project to in the output image.
     * Expecting 2 floats representing the u,v coordinates of the
     * anchor point.

variables.name: mCameraOrbitYawDegrees
variables.comment:
* Specifies the amount of yaw orbit rotation the camera should perform
     * around the anchor point in world space.

variables.name: mCameraOrbitPitchDegrees
variables.comment:
* Specifies the amount of pitch orbit rotation the camera should perform
     * around the anchor point in world space.

variables.name: mDollyDistanceInWorldSpace
variables.comment:
* Specifies by how much the camera should be placed towards the anchor
     * point in world space, which is also called dolly distance.

variables.name: mVerticalFovDegrees
variables.comment: * Specifies the vertical fov degrees of the virtual image.

methods.name: public float[] getAnchorPointInWorldSpace()
methods.comment:
* Get the location of the anchor within the 3D scene. The response float array contains
     * 3 floats representing the x, y, z coordinates

methods.name: public float[] getAnchorPointInOutputUvSpace()
methods.comment:
* Get where the anchor point should project to in the output image. The response float
     * array contains 2 floats representing the u,v coordinates of the anchor point.

methods.name: public float getCameraOrbitYawDegrees()
methods.comment: * Get the camera yaw orbit rotation.

methods.name: public float getCameraOrbitPitchDegrees()
methods.comment: * Get the camera pitch orbit rotation.

methods.name: public float getDollyDistanceInWorldSpace()
methods.comment: * Get how many units the camera should be placed towards the anchor point in world space.

methods.name: public float getVerticalFovDegrees()
methods.comment: * Get the camera vertical fov degrees.

methods.name: public float getFrustumNearInWorldSpace()
methods.comment: * Get the frustum in near plane.

methods.name: public float getFrustumFarInWorldSpace()
methods.comment: * Get the frustum in far plane.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
